controlImperatives.description: Approved control rules that every migration step must satisfy before advancing to the next maturity gate.

imperatives.name: Handshake Logged
imperatives.description: Every system-to-system connection must produce a validated, timestamped handshake log entry.

imperatives.name: Lineage Completeness
imperatives.description: Each asset must trace to an approved source in the migration path before domain assignment.

imperatives.name: Ownership Assigned
imperatives.description: Every investment asset must have an assigned data owner and steward in Collibra.

imperatives.name: Policy Compliance
imperatives.description: Assets must pass all applicable data quality and privacy policies before certification.

imperatives.name: Variance Gate
imperatives.description: KPI variance from baseline must be <= 10% for stage-4 advancement.

imperatives.name: Back-Snap Available
imperatives.description: A restorable snapshot must exist before any stage-3+ migration executes.

imperatives.name: Edge Cap Not Exceeded
imperatives.description: Concurrent migration count must not exceed the edge cap limit defined in edgeCap/model.json.
